title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 16 October 2012 - XWiki
content:
00:28 <jvdrean> has quit  
00:31 <SvenDowideit> has quit  
00:31 <SvenDowideit> has joined #xwiki  
03:49 <sdumitriu> has quit  
04:44 <polx\_> has joined #xwiki  
04:46 <polx> has quit  
04:46 <polx\_> is now known as <polx>  
05:07 <tekzilla> has quit  
05:08 <tekzilla> has joined #xwiki  
07:01 <Denis1> has joined #xwiki  
07:03 <Denis> has quit  
07:23 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
07:23 <mflorea> has quit  
07:24 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
07:25 <coud5> has joined #xwiki  
08:07 <mflorea> has quit  
08:23 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
08:34 <dirk\_schmitt> has joined #xwiki  
08:42 <dirk\_schmitt> How can I diff 2 pages, e.g. 2 color schemes ?  
08:42 <dirk\_schmitt> Is there a tool similar to the diff of two revisions ?  
09:07 <polx> has quit  
09:18 <mrvanes> has joined #xwiki  
09:35 <coud5> has quit  
09:37 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
09:46 <vmassol> has quit  
09:50 <eshan> has joined #xwiki  
09:50 <eshan> has left #xwiki  
10:01 <cdop> has joined #xwiki  
10:08 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
10:19 <dirk\_schmitt> I'm adapting my color themes to work around XWIKI-8324.  
10:19 <dirk\_schmitt> On the "selected tab" I have always an outline effect adapted the "tab title".  
10:19 <dirk\_schmitt> E.g. https://www.pfarreiengemeinschaft-westum-loehndorf.de/xwiki/bin/view/Main/Dashboard#Annotations  
10:19 <dirk\_schmitt> compare to https://www.pfarreiengemeinschaft-westum-loehndorf.de/xwiki/bin/view/Sandbox/WebHome#Annotations  
10:19 <dirk\_schmitt> If I use the color "white" I see clearly the black "outline border".  
10:19 <dirk\_schmitt> Is this a bug or have I done something wrong ?  
10:20 <vmassol> dirk\_schmitt: it's a pity evalica isn't online (I think she's on holiday) since she could have answered all your question about color themes :)  
10:21 <vmassol> guys, fyi i'm going to start migrating xwiki.org to 4.2 in a few minutes  
10:21 <vmassol> Denis1: hope you're around in case there's a problem with the migration ;)  
10:22 <Denis1> is now known as <Denis>  
10:22 <+Denis> vmassol: yes :)  
10:22 <vmassol> cool
